title: Create a Kanban board UI
description: The board should have columns for 'To Do', 'In Progress', 'Review', and 'Done'.

title: Implement drag-and-drop for tasks
description: Tasks should be movable between columns with visual feedback.

title: Setup TypeScript integration
description: Convert vanilla JavaScript to TypeScript with proper types and modular architecture.

title: Initial project setup
description: Setup the git repository and initial file structure with package.json.

title: Task editing functionality
description: Allow users to edit existing tasks with inline buttons.
